column.name: htmlheader
column.value:
<style type="text/css">

html {
 background: @@@import:pagebackcol@@@; 			/* default background colour */
 border: 0;
 margin: 0;
 padding: 0;
 height: 100%;
 max-height: 100%;
 /* \*/
 overflow: hidden;
 /* */
}

body {
 border: 0;
 margin: 0;
 padding: 0;
 height: 100%;
 max-height: 100%;
 overflow: hidden;
}

#header {
 background: @@@import:headerbackcol@@@;		/* header background colour */
 color: @@@import:headertextcol@@@;			/* header text colour */
 height: @@@import:headerheight@@@;				/* header height */
 display: block;
 position: absolute;
 top: 0px;
 left: 0px;
 margin: 0;
 width: 100%;
 overflow: visible;
 z-index: 5;
}

#left, #right {
 position: absolute;
 left: 0px;
 top: @@@import:headerheight@@@;				/* header height */
 bottom: @@@import:footerheight@@@;				/* footer height */
 overflow:auto;
}

* html #left, * html #right {
 height: 100%;
 top: 0px;
 bottom: 0px;
 border-top-style: solid;
 border-top-width: @@@import:headerheight@@@;		/* header height */
 border-top-color: @@@import:headerbackcol@@@;	/* header background colour */
 border-bottom-style: solid;
 border-bottom-width: @@@import:footerheight@@@;		/* footer height */
 border-bottom-color: @@@import:footerbackcol@@@;	/* footer background colour */
}

#left {
 left: 0px;
 width: 50%;				/* left column width */
 background: @@@import:leftbackcol@@@;			/* left column background colour */
 color: @@@import:lefttextcol@@@;			/* left column text colour */
 z-index: 3;
}

#right {
 left: 50%;				/* left column width  */
 width: 50%;				/* right column width */
 background: @@@import:rightbackcol@@@;			/* right column background colour */
 color: @@@import:righttextcol@@@;			/* right column text colour */
}

#footer {
 background: @@@import:footerbackcol@@@;			/* footer background colour */
 color: @@@import:footertextcol@@@;			/* footer text colour */
 height: @@@import:footerheight@@@;				/* footer height */
 display: block;
 position: absolute;
 bottom: 0px;
 left: 0px;
 margin: 0;
 width: 100%;
 z-index: 4;
}

</style>

column.name: content
column.value:
@@@logo.content@@@ @@@banner.content@@@
@@@menu.content@@@

@@@title@@@

@@@content@@@
@@@toolbar.content@@@

column.name: content

@@@title@@@
